attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people are protesting by voting against the ruling party.  The system is that the Prime Minister has the last call on when an election is to be held.  This is a ludicrous situation which cannot be allowed to obtain.  This country needs to take control of its own destiny and not leave it in the hands of one man, and in this case, a man who has NEVER been voted for by the vast majority of the people being affected by his political weakness.
